backend/main.mo: Actor canister handling contacts, appointment requests, domain drafts, and decommission mode with admin‑gated access control.
feature_evidence.json: Report mapping a homepage background‑image feature to affected files, components, and requirement IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend pages, components, hooks, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS theme defining OKLCH color tokens for light and dark modes and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting the site title and favicon assets and loading the React app root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with layout and routes for all major pages including home, services, and emergency.
frontend/src/components/forms/Appointmen: Validated appointment request form submitting data via a mutation hook with success and error states.
frontend/src/components/forms/ContactFor: Validated contact form that posts user messages to the backend and displays submission feedback.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Renders the site footer showing branding, contact details, and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Provides a responsive header with navigation links, mobile menu, and branding.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Wraps pages with a consistent header, footer, and main content area.
frontend/src/config/branding.ts: Defines the hospital name and a helper for composing page titles.
frontend/src/config/contactDetails.ts: Centralizes contact info and exports helpers for retrieving emergency and phone links.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the user's Internet Identity, invalidating queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useDomainDraft.ts: Empty placeholder file for a hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements context and provider for Internet Identity authentication and identity management.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitAppointmentR: Mutation hook for submitting appointment requests through the backend actor with error normalization.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitContact.ts: Mutation hook for submitting contact forms via the backend actor with standardized error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a custom color palette for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, QueryClient, and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission, vision, values, and styling, setting the page title on mount.
frontend/src/pages/AppointmentRequestPag: Displays an appointment booking page with steps overview and a form for submitting appointment requests.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Shows contact details (phone, email, address, hours) and provides a contact form for user inquiries.
frontend/src/pages/DecommissionedPage.ts: Renders a notice indicating the site is decommissioned and no longer accepting submissions.
frontend/src/pages/DoctorsPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/DomainDraftPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/EmergencyPage.tsx: Outlines 24/7 emergency services with call-to-action buttons and informational cards about emergency care.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home landing page featuring hero section, appointment and services navigation, and an emergency services highlight.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Displays a 404 error message with a button to navigate back to the home page.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Shows a hero section and a large grid of medical services, each with icon, title, and description.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash-based), store and retrieve them in sessionStorage, and clear them from storage or the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, shadows, animations, and plugins for the project’s styling.
project_state.json: Describes the current project state, including features, requests, metadata, and configuration details.
